author: HuffPost Video
description: Melania Trump has a really hard time holding her husband’s hand. Don’t believe it? Here’s the proof.
title: Melania Trump Hates Holding Donald's Hand

author: Claire Zillman
description: Unlike other first ladies, Melania Trump isn't afraid to wear a frown in public.
title: The Subtle Power of Melania Trump’s Poker Face

author: Allie Malloy, Sara Murray and Jeremy Diamond, CNN
description: Melania Trump has dutifully considered every outfit she has worn during her first trip abroad as first lady -- her visit with Pope Francis on Wednesday was no exception.
title: Melania Trump wears veil, but not a headscarf

author: Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D.
description: After Melania Trump met with Pope Francis in the Vatican Wednesday, her spokeswoman confirmed that the First Lady is indeed a Roman Catholic.
title: Melania Trump Is First Catholic to Live in White House Since JFK

author: Penny Starr
description: Melania Trump smiles at passersby on a highway in Sevnica, Solvenia that reads “Welcome to the Hometown of First Lady”.
title: First Lady Melania Trump Boosts Tourism in Her Home Country

author: Anushay Hossain
description: It's no surprise Melania Trump was a hit in Saudi Arabia, Anushay Hossain writes: She's their perfect combination of quiet, fashionable femininity and fake feminism.
title: The ugly truth behind Saudi Arabia's love for Melania Trump

author: Tom Kington
description: First Lady Melania Trump does not say much in public, but her actions seemed to speak louder than words – or at least sent tongues wagg...
title: So what's with the president and Melania Trump holding, or not holding, hands?

description: President Trump attempted to hold his wife Melania's hand at the exact moment she reached up to adjust flyaway strands of hair.
title: Does Melania Trump Really Not Want to Hold Her Husband’s Hand?

author: Kate Bennett, CNN's COVER/LINE
description: As the overseas debut of President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump draws to a close -- the couple is set to return to Washington this weekend -- there was the usual bluster and bravado from the President.
title: What we learned about Melania Trump from her first international trip

author: DARLENE SUPERVILLE
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — To cover up or not to cover up? Melania Trump wore a veil to the Vatican on Wednesday to meet the pope, but no head covering a few days earlier to meet the king of Saudi Arabia, a religiously conservative country where most women cover themselves up from head to toe. Why the difference? The answer is a complicated mix of personal preference, diplomatic protocol and religious dictates.
title: Why Melania Trump covers her head one day and not the next
